relation: Support for custom options from the compression interface (eg. a slider for selecting compression level for rar files)
Add feedback for the latest operation in the status bar
Add feedback for the latest operation in the status bar
Try multiple plugins for each archive type before failing
Make keyserver actions possible to use on multiple keyservers at once
add support for import by drop, both url and data
copy again puts also a value or char variant of the data to clipboard
add support for memory mapping of files and 64-bit addressing
add support for jobs like io, printing, string search or filter
Store bookmarks and other view settings for next load
Add global toggle option for the offset display, hex or decimal
Add Kate-like combined dialogs to query for actions on files
Improve the titels of the changes to the bytearray to be more descriptive, best using ids to avoid text string
Merge row and column widgets into one
Refactor mouse input to controllers for the bytearray widget
Add a general KPart adapter to Kasten, than finish port of Okteta KPart to Okteta Kasten
Make all user interaction in the KastenCore managers plugin-based
Add KNewStuff support to the structures tool
Restore feature parity with KDEPrint3 where possible.
Allow writing structure definitions in JavaScript
new export formats: S-Record, Intel Hex, Base32, Ascii85, Uuencoding, Xxencoding
add QIODevice for AbstractByteArrayModel and make mimetype detection use this instead of only filename
